sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto market remains under sustained bearish pressure as weak demand and low confidence dominate price action into year-end.
Bears have a firm grip on the leading GameFi tokens, with the majority of them in the red.
A hoped-for breakout year in 2025 failed to materialize as the October crypto crash dragged down the already struggling corner of the alts...
Bitcoin bulls are putting up a fight on Friday to break this week's choppy action that has capped all advances at around $90000.
BitFuFu Inc. is deeply undervalued versus peers, trading at a forward EV/Sales of 1.23x. Click here to read why FUFU stock is a Buy.

hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity-Gap Fill After News-Induced Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a significant (>8%) single-day BTC price breakout driven by a scheduled macro news event (CPI, FOMC, ETF flow announcement), price will retrace to fill the previous day's liquidity gap (between prior close and current open) within 3-5 days before resuming the breakout direction, offering a high-probability entry on the retest.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News-induced gaps often overextend short-term sentiment, creating liquidity voids that markets tend to fill. The retest of the gap area provides a lower-risk entry to join the post-news trend once initial volatility subsides.
entry_conditions: BTC gaps up/down >8% at open following scheduled news
Gap remains unfilled by end of gap day
Price retraces to fill 75%-100% of the gap within next 5 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Original breakout direction resumes: price exceeds the gap-day high (if bull gap) or low (if bear gap)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves beyond gap fill by 2% in opposite direction of original breakout

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Gaps remain unfilled >50% of the time, or post-fill continuation in the original direction occurs less than 60% of the time.
